sections.title: Ratios and Comparisons
content: If the ratio of speeds of A and B is a:b, then the ratio of times to cover the same distance is b:a (or 1/a : 1/b)

sections.title: Average Speed (Different Distances & Speeds)
content: Average Speed = Total Distance / Total Time
- First 30 km at 15 km/hr → Time = 30 / 15 = 2 hours
- Next 40 km at 10 km/hr → Time = 40 / 10 = 4 hours
- Last 30 km at 30 km/hr → Time = 30 / 30 = 1 hour
- Total Distance = 100 km, Total Time = 7 hours
